section.title: 2. Environment Setup
section.p: No environment setup instructions were provided.

section.title: AI Content Generation Endpoint
section.p: The /ai/generate endpoint allows users to request AI-generated technical writing content.

ul.li: Request:Method: POSTData: A text prompt from the frontend.
Response:Content-Type: application/jsonData: A JSON object containing the generated text.
Error Handling:The endpoint returns appropriate HTTP status codes for failures or invalid input.

section.title: Document Editor UI
section.p: The Document Editor UI provides a rich text editing experience.

ul.li: Integration:The editor integrates with the backend for loading and saving document content.
User Feedback:Visual indicators, such as loading spinners and success toasts, provide feedback during save operations.
Styling:Utilizes Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui for consistent styling and accessibility.
Responsiveness:The UI is responsive and supports dark mode.

section.title: User Registration API
section.p: The User Registration API facilitates secure user account creation.

ul.li: Request Data:email: A unique email address.password: A password with a minimum length of 8 characters.displayName: User's display name.
Security:Passwords are hashed using bcrypt before storage.
Response on Success:A signed JSON Web Token (JWT) is returned to authenticate the user session.
Logging:All registration events are logged for auditing and monitoring purposes.
